column5: I picked up my new (and first!) Digital camera today. A panasonic DMC-FZ7. David Chong met me at a jobsite I was working at in TO and brought me the camera. He gave me an incredible deal!   Anyone looking to buy a new camera definately contact Dave.  Thanks again Dave, looking forward to posting some pics soon, and not using my Daughter's 2mp Kodak!
That's awesome Dax.  Are you bringing it to the swill Wednesday night? I've always said that Dave is a CLASS act.
Not sure I can make it Roger. Might be working a night job in TO. Man I hate construction work...Shoulda stayed in MED school!

I gots the FZ8, same deal with Dave Chong, on Friday.  He dropped by work and even drove me to the bank.  He called me yesterday with his Algonquin laker report from the weekend, and to see how my new toy was working out.   A nice type o guy fer sure.
Doug & Dax, It was my pleasure! Nice to meet some fellow OFC'ers, thanks for the business! I'll help out OFC'ers with any camera purchases whenever possible! Cheers, Dave
douG & Dax you guys will love the lumix.  I've the FZ7 (also bought from Dave) and I think it's a great cam.
